title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of GDP, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Share of GDP has decreased over the Year.
Share of GDP is roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2022.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2021 and 2022.
Max Share of GDP about 97.1 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Share of GDP about 91.4 was recorded at Year 2022
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of GDP, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2019 to 2022.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
